definition: to emerge and perish on its own; to run its course (idiom)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: However, that success may have run its course.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這種成功可能會自生自滅。

sentences.english: When you make a mistake you need to correct a mistake, not leave Iraq to its death.
sentences.chinese: 犯了錯誤就要改正錯誤，別任由伊拉克自生自滅。

sentences.english: Leave the land alone and allow it to heal our planet.
sentences.chinese: 任由這些土地自生自滅就能治癒我們的星球。
